name: deOTC
description: The World's First Decentralized OTC Terminal DEOTC is designed to eliminate the biggest flaws in DeFi. Say goodbye to front-running bots, price slippage, and chart-killing sell pressure. With DEOTC, users can list and buy tokens directly from each other in a transparent, secure, and peer-to-peer environment, backed by ultra-fast smart contracts and optional KYC through global leader Veriff. This isn't just a platformâ€”it's a DeFi revolution. We're reimagining what OTC trading can be and building the blueprint for the next generation of decentralized finance.
